attributes.action: Change the Policy to Not backing a Country that will Not comply
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britian will Not be part of anymore yank led Military campaigns on another sovereign country until the USA agree to comply with International Laws, Genevia Conventions and Other Rules of war as they need to act in a civilized way to make progress. The PM should change his policy and tell the usa that they need to be able to show evidence that can stand up to crucial international scrutiny befor any more invasion and occupation coalitions could be justified by the british government.

rejection.details: There is no such policy to change.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
